TopicTitle: Amazing Beauty Shot of my Double Barreled Asparagus Spaceship

Articles.Content:
I decided to film a beauty shot of my most achomplished vessel, The Joolius Caesar III, which completed the Jool 5 Challenge somtime after 1.0 came out. So I hyperedited it out to Jool and took this screenshot. All I can say is OH YEAH. What do you guys think? I might make more of these with some of my other ships. I already have a few ideas... Also does anyone have a suggestion on a Jool re-texture? I think the current one is kinda meh.

Edited October 22, 2016 by JacobJHC

Have you looked at Stock Visual Enhancements?  That mod has some amazing retextures of the Kerbol system planets including Jool.

I really wish Astronomer's Visual Pack still updated.  That was my favorite, but I only got to use it for a short time before 1.1 made it incompatible and it was never updated past 1.0.4.

Nice shot indeed.

Something to consider: the nicest Jool shots I actually get from Jupiter and its moons from the Stock Scale Real Solar System mod. Its awesome.

I tried to find a better Jool texture but couldn't. I once tried to use scatterer for the nice graphics and destroyed my framerate but a new Jool texture was never a problem for me. Do you have any suggestions for a Jool texture?

2 hours ago, Dafni said:

Nice shot indeed.

Something to consider: the nicest Jool shots I actually get from Jupiter and its moons from the Stock Scale Real Solar System mod. Its awesome.

I keep having issues with Real Solar System. Once it updates for 1.2 in ckan I will try to get to Europa, if I can get to orbit..

Although I do agree that Jupiter is one of the most visually pleasing planets in our Solar System.
